titleStmt.title: Mr. Rees Prichar[d] gynt ficcar Llan-ddyfri yn Shir Gaer-f[] ddyn, a ofodwyd allan er Daioni'r Cymru. Some part of the works of Mr. Rees Prichar[d] sometimes vicker of Llandyfri in the co[unty] of Carmarthen.
titleStmt.author: Prichard, Rhys, 1579-1644.

publicationStmt.publisher: Ag a werthir gan Thomas Brewster ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: t.p. cropped on side, with some loss of print; text cropped, with loss of pagination.
